Address.label: Address
Address.value: 615 J.B. HUNT CORPORATE DRIVE,P.O. BOX 130, LOWELL, Arkansas, 72745-0130, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: J.B. Hunt Transport Services ranks among the top surface transportation companies in North America by revenue. Its primary operating segments are intermodal delivery, which uses the Class I rail carriers for the underlying line-haul movement of its owned containers (45% of sales in 2021); dedicated trucking services that provide customer-specific fleet needs (21%); for-hire truckload (7%); heavy goods final-mile delivery (6%), and asset-light truck brokerage (21%).
